item.title: Mandy add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "I've always loved you, and when you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Not one word, not one gesture of yours shall I, could I, ever forget..." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "It makes you wonder. All the brilliant things we might have done with our lives if only we suspected we knew how." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Mandy add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies, said Jojen. The man who never reads lives only one." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Mandy add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "Why did you do all this for me?' he asked. 'I don't deserve it. I've never done anything for you.' 'You have been my friend,' replied Charlotte. 'That in itself is a tremendous thing." -- E.B. White

item.title: Mandy add a quote by James Earl Jones
item.description: "Ray. People will come, Ray. They'll come to Iowa for reasons they can't even fathom. They'll turn up your driveway not knowing for sure why they're doing it. They'll arrive at your door as innocent as children, longing for the past. "Of course, we won't mind if you look around", you'll say, "It's only $20 per person". They'll pass over the money without even thinking about it: for it is money they have and peace they lack. And they'll walk out to the bleachers; sit in shirtsleeves on a perfect afternoon. They'll find they have reserved seats somewhere along one of the baselines, where they sat when they were children and cheered their heroes. And they'll watch the game and it'll be as if they dipped themselves in magic waters. The memories will be so thick they'll have to brush them away from their faces. People will come Ray. The one constant through all the years, Ray, has been baseball. America has rolled by like an army of steamrollers. It has been erased like a blackboard, rebuilt and erased again. But baseball has marked the time. This field, this game: it's a part of our past, Ray. It reminds us of all that once was good and that could be again. Oh...people will come Ray. People will most definitely come." -- James Earl Jones

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Waqar Ahmed
item.description: "Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks" -- Waqar Ahmed

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Steve Lopez
item.description: ".. a friend is someone who inspires, who challenges, who sends you in search of some truer sense of yourself.." -- Steve Lopez

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Mandy add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Mandy add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Happiness is the consequence of personal effort. You fight for it, strive for it, insist upon it, and sometimes even travel around the world looking for it. You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestations of your own blessings. And once you have achieved a state of happiness, you must never become lax about maintaining it. You must make a mighty effort to keep swimming upward into that happiness forever, to stay afloat on top of it." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Mandy add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Mandy add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The glory of friendship is not the outstretched hand, not the kindly smile, nor the joy of companionship; it is the spiritual inspiration that comes to one when you discover that someone else believes in you and is willing to trust you with a friendship." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Friends are honest with each other. Even if the truth hurts. -Maggie" -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Mandy add a quote by John O'Donohue
item.description: "Every friendship travels at sometime through the black valley of despair. This tests every aspect of your affection. You lose the attraction and the magic. Your sense of each other darkens and your presence is sore. If you can come through this time, it can purify with your love, and falsity and need will fall away. It will bring you onto new ground where affection can grow again." -- John O'Donohue

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "If people refuse to look at you in a new light and they can only see you for what you were, only see you for the mistakes you've made, if they don't realize that you are not your mistakes, then they have to go." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Stepping onto a brand-new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation, which is not nurturing to the whole woman." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "One day spent with someone you love can change everything." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "Let him who would move the world first move himself." -- Socrates

item.title: Mandy add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "It's up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind." -- Steve Maraboli
